weather_report:
This afternoon, Downtown San Francisco bathes in a rare moment of clarity, its skyline standing boldly against a vast expanse of bright blue. The high temperature grazes fifty-nine degrees, accompanied by gentle north winds that whisper through the streets. As the day advances towards its golden twilight, the temperature will settle around fifty-seven, creating an inviting atmosphere perfect for a leisurely stroll. Tonight, a comforting calm will envelop the city, with mostly clear skies and temperatures gracefully edging towards the mid-forties, encouraging evenings spent outside under the stars, perhaps while wrapped in a light jacket.

Such delightful weather invites a variety of simple pleasures. A walk along the Embarcadero could yield enchanting views of the bay, shimmering under the last rays of daylight. The lack of fog, a common companion in the Bay Area, presents an ideal opportunity for enjoying rooftop dining or sipping a warm beverage in one of the city's quaint cafés. Whether exploring the art-laden streets of the Mission or browsing the shops in Union Square, this day feels like an embrace—a perfect canvas for uncovering the small wonders of urban life. A light scarf would suffice as the evening chill sets in, making it a pleasant day to be out and about.
